Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. Given its immense value to you, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $1100000. This represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,100,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,100,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
